services.title: Sky Pixel Detection in outdoor imagery
services.description: Developed using pre-trained PSPNet segmentation model, TensorFlow, Keras, NumPy & Matplotlib. The model takes input as hundreds of temporal images taken from a fixed perspective and gives an output image which marks the sky area in white and other areas in black

services.title: India Young Foundation WebDev
services.description: Developed the website for India Young Foundation using Django framework and PostgreSQL with functionalities such as Mailing System, Blog and Payment (Paytm API)

services.title: Hacker Newspaper
services.description: Hacker News' "Ask HN" column with newspaper like UI developed using ReactJS, CSS & Hacker News API

services.title: Delhi's Guardians WebDev
services.description: Developed using Wix with functionalities such as automatic mailing system, booking system, blog and Instragram integration

services.title: Spielen Android App
services.description: Developed with Android Studio, Firebase & Java. Spielen is a platform for sports enthusiasts to connect and play sports together.

services.title: Atal Innovation Mission WebDev
services.description: Developed a complex online application form with PHP for the 'Mentor of Change' program during my internship at NITI Aayog

services.title: Library Management System
services.description: Developed using Python, Tkinter and MySQLite
